Intelligent Campaign Strategies

Cory adapts outreach based on prospect behavior and engagement level

New Leads (Day 0-4 Intensive)

High-intensity engagement for fresh inquiries when interest is peak

Day 0 (Submission Day)

0:00 Form submit triggers Cory Voice
0:30 AI call attempt (voicemail if no answer) Voice
0:45 SMS intro + help offer SMS
1:00 Welcome email with brochure + calendar link Email

Day 1-2

9:00 AM Follow-up call attempt Voice
2:00 PM Program details email Email
6:00 PM SMS with success story SMS

Compliance & Security Built-In

FERPA Compliant

Educational record protection with secure data handling and appropriate access controls for student information.

TCPA Compliant SMS

All messaging requires explicit consent with clear opt-out instructions and automatic list management.

SOC 2 Certified

Bank-level security with encrypted data transmission and storage, regular audits, and penetration testing.

Do Not Call Registry

Respects DNC preferences and state-specific calling regulations with automatic time zone detection.
